en.own-data-only.plugin.name: Own Data Only
en.own-data-only.plugin.description: Restrict users to only access their own data
en.own-data-only.homepage.title: How to use the Own Data Only plugin
en.own-data-only.homepage.description: This plugin adds an "Own Data Only" checkbox to the permissions UI in the Strapi admin panel.
en.own-data-only.homepage.instructions: To use this feature, go to Settings > Roles, select a role, and you will see the "Own Data Only" checkbox next to the standard permissions (find, findOne, update, delete).
en.own-data-only.homepage.explanation: When enabled, users with this role will only be able to access, modify, or delete their own data.
